content: I need an exhaustive list of Edition 2021 changes so that I can track their implementation in rust-analyzer. Where can I find this?

@Jonas Schievink [he/him] That looks complete to me (the published one is at https://blog.rust-lang.org/2021/05/11/edition-2021.html). There's also the project board at https://github.com/orgs/rust-lang/projects/7 which goes into exhaustive detail of every change.

yeah there's eight edition changes. the blog post is the complete overview. you can also look at the not-yet-published edition guide, but right now that's literally that blog post split into one page per section.
